${ModID}:Shelling.NAME: Shelling
${ModID}:Shelling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, and !D! damage to a random other enemy. NL Gain 1 ${ModID}:Shell.

${ModID}:Suppress.NAME: Suppress
${ModID}:Suppress.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak. NL ${ModID}:Retaliatory: Target loses 2 Strength temporarily.

${ModID}:BallisticStrike.NAME: Ballistic Strike
${ModID}:BallisticStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${ModID}:Retaliatory: Target takes double damage. NL Deal !D! damage to other enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DefensePlanning.NAME: Defense Planning
${ModID}:DefensePlanning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you don't have Blur, gain 1 Blur.

${ModID}:Logistics.NAME: Logistics
${ModID}:Logistics.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 ${ModID}:Shell. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:ThinkTwice.NAME: Think Twice
${ModID}:ThinkTwice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL Gain !M! block for each enemy that intends to attack.

${ModID}:Shrapnel.NAME: Shrapnel
${ModID}:Shrapnel.DESCRIPTION: Your hits apply 1 Vulnerable and 2 ${ModID}:Ignite per 10 unblocked damage.
${ModID}:Shrapnel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Your hits apply 1 Vulnerable and 2 ${ModID}:Ignite per 10 unblocked damage.

${ModID}:ShellForge.NAME: Shell Forge
${ModID}:ShellForge.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Shells provide an additional !m! damage. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 ${ModID}:Shell.

${ModID}:DigIn.NAME: Dig In
${ModID}:DigIn.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Blur. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] if you have any Block left.

${ModID}:Prevail.NAME: Prevail
${ModID}:Prevail.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. NL Enemies who take at least 10 damage in a single hit lose !M! Strength temporarily.
